patthana15.5:1.1: Hetuṃ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.5:2.1: Nahetuṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.5:3.1: Hetuṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
